requiredEquipmentExplanation: Based on the analysis of the video's metadata, it is clear that this workout does not require any equipment. The title explicitly states "No Equipment," indicating that the exercises can be performed using only body weight. The tags also focus on Pilates and abs without mentioning any specific equipment. Additionally, the channel specializes in short home workouts and emphasizes that you do not need equipment or a gym membership to achieve results. Comments do not suggest any equipment involvement either. Hence, it can be confidently concluded that this is a bodyweight-only workout.
